actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution directing the President to provide to the House of Representatives certain information with respect to any payment made by the United States to influence Italian politics.

summary.text: Directs the President to furnish to the House of Representatives information concerning the payment of funds by the United States Armed Forces or Embassy staff to the Italian Christian Democratic Party or the Italian media. Specifies that such information shall include: the amount of funds involved; the date such funds were offered and delivered; the identity of the intended recipient of such payment; the instrumentality of the United States Government responsible for such payment; and the circumstances surrounding such payment. Calls for similar information concerning the involvement of individuals attached to any United States Embassy or employed by any United States multinational corporation in the use of any extraconstitutional means to solve the Italian political crisis.

titles.title: Resolution directing the President to provide to the House of Representatives certain information with respect to any payment made by the United States to influence Italian politics.
